upload.title: Upload Match Footage
upload.instructionsText: Please upload your match footage in MP4 format. The maximum file size is 2GB.
upload.matchNamePlaceholder: e.g. Team A vs Team B

matchDetails.title: Match Details: {{matchName}}
matchDetails.overviewContent: Detailed match statistics and analysis will be displayed here.
matchDetails.reportsContent: Generated reports and insights for this match will be listed here.
matchDetails.interactiveContent: Interactive visualizations and player tracking data will be available here.

teamDetails.title: Team Details: {{teamName}}
teamDetails.statsContent: Detailed team statistics will be displayed here.
teamDetails.matchesContent: Recent match results and upcoming fixtures will be listed here.
teamDetails.analysisContent: In-depth team analysis and performance trends will be shown here.

playerDetails.title: Player Details: {{playerName}}
playerDetails.statsContent: Detailed player statistics will be displayed here.
playerDetails.matchesContent: Recent match performances will be listed here.
playerDetails.analysisContent: In-depth player analysis and performance trends will be shown here.

help.title: Help Center
help.faq1Question: How do I upload a match video?
help.faq1Answer: Go to the Upload page, select your video file, fill in the match details, and click 'Upload Footage'.
help.faq2Question: How long does it take to analyze a match?
help.faq2Answer: Analysis time depends on the video length and quality. Typically, it takes 1-2 hours for a full match.
help.faq3Question: Can I edit match details after uploading?
help.faq3Answer: Yes, you can edit match details by going to the match page and clicking 'Edit Match'.

about.title: About Fieldstats
about.missionContent: Fieldstats aims to revolutionize football analysis through AI-powered video processing, providing coaches and analysts with deep insights into player and team performance.
about.teamContent: We are a dedicated group of sports enthusiasts, data scientists, and software engineers passionate about bringing cutting-edge technology to the beautiful game.
about.technologyContent: Fieldstats uses state-of-the-art computer vision and machine learning algorithms to extract valuable data from match footage, offering unparalleled analysis capabilities.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introductionContent: By using Fieldstats, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use.
terms.useOfServiceContent: You agree to use Fieldstats only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the service.
terms.privacyContent: Your use of Fieldstats is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which can be found on our website.
terms.disclaimerContent: Fieldstats is provided 'as is' without any representations or warranties, express or implied.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionContent: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use Fieldstats.
privacy.dataCollectionContent: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, upload content, or contact us for support.
privacy.dataUsageContent: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, and to develop new ones.
privacy.userRightsContent: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time.

teamPlayers.title: Players of {{teamName}}
teamPlayers.noPlayers: No players found for this team

teamPlayer.title: Player Details: {{playerName}}
teamPlayer.performanceContent: Detailed performance metrics for this player will be displayed here.
teamPlayer.historyContent: This player's match history and statistics will be shown here.
teamPlayer.analysisContent: In-depth analysis of the player's strengths, weaknesses, and trends will be presented here.

playerStats.title: Player Stats: {{playerName}}
playerStats.matchPerformanceContent: Detailed match-by-match performance data will be displayed here.
playerStats.advancedStatsContent: AI-driven analysis and advanced statistics will be shown here.

LandingPage.title: Fieldstats
LandingPage.heroSubtitle: Transform your small football team's performance with advanced video analysis and actionable insights, in budget.
LandingPage.feature1Description: Our AI algorithms analyze every aspect of the game, providing detailed insights on player movements, tactics, and team performance.
LandingPage.feature2Description: Generate in-depth reports with visualizations and statistics to make data-driven decisions for your team.
LandingPage.feature3Description: Simply upload your match footage, and our system will process and analyze it, delivering results quickly and efficiently.
LandingPage.ctaTitle: Ready to Elevate Your Team's Performance?
LandingPage.ctaSubtitle: Join other coaches and analysts who are already using Fieldstats to gain a competitive edge.
